name: Visiting
description:
Credit:
"Visiting" is a short and simple exploration game created with Bitsy (https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy) by Hannah Parks.

How To Play:
Make sure to click within the viewport to start the game. Use the Arrow Keys to move and interact with the characters.

Description:
You play as a self-insert character and talk with the villagers and animals of a beach-side village. The old man you first talk to gives you your main goal of the game: to find and talk with a Starfish.
